title: minecraft:enchantable v1.20.50
description: The enchantable component determines what enchantments can be applied to the item. Not all enchantments will have an effect on all item components.

slot.description: What enchantments can be applied (ex. Using `bow` would allow this item to be enchanted as if it were a bow).

value.description: The value of the enchantment (minimum of 0).
